mapper.select: select jkey, jpum , jgugek , jsize, jmodel_code, jcolor_code, jcustomer_code, convert(integer, DBO.DF_TB_PCODE_JQTY(jkey, #{frdate}, #{todate}) ) as jqty from JCODE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jcustomer_code,'') Like concat('%',#{jcustomer_code},'%') and isnull(jpum,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%') ORDER BY jcustomer_code, jmodel_code, jpum

select jkey, j_dae, j_jung, jgugek, jgugek2, jpumcode, jpumname, jsayang, jpum, jboxsu1, jgumtype, j_net, jchajong, j_sr, j_ct, j_cavity, Convert(int, jchgoga0) AS jchgoga0, jbigo, jdanwy, w_b_gubn, E.jcifcodename as jcifcodename, j_misayong, j_sang, cltcd , F.acorp as acorp from JCODE WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN jcifcode E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (JCODE.jkey = E.jcifcode) LEFT OUTER JOIN cif F WITH(NOLOCK) ON (JCODE.cltcd = F.acorp1 + CAST(F.acorp2 as varchar)) WHERE (isnull(jpum,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%') or isnull(jkey,'') Like concat('%',#{jkey},'%')) and isnull(j_misayong,'0') Like concat('%',#{j_misayong},'%') ORDER BY jkey

select jkey, j_dae, j_jung, jgugek, jpum, jgugek2, jpumcode, jboxsu1, jgumtype, jsayang, j_net, jchajong, j_sr, j_ct, j_cavity, jdanwy, w_b_gubn, Convert(int, jchgoga0) AS jchgoga0, jbigo, E.jcifcodename as jcifcodename from JCODE WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN jcifcode E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (JCODE.jkey = E.jcifcode) WHERE isnull(jpum,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%') and isnull(jkey,'') Like concat('%',#{jkey},'%') ORDER BY jpum
mapper.insert: insert into JCODE ( jkey, j_dae, j_jung, jgugek, jpum, jgugek2, jpumcode, jpumname, cltcd, jgumtype, jsayang, j_net, jchajong, j_sr, j_ct, j_cavity, jdanwy, jbigo, w_b_gubn, jchgoga0 ,j_misayong ,j_sang, jboxsu1) values (#{jkey}, #{j_dae}, #{j_jung}, #{jgugek}, #{jpum}, #{jgugek2}, #{jpumcode}, #{jpumname},#{cltcd}, #{jgumtype}, #{jsayang}, #{j_net}, #{jchajong}, #{j_sr}, #{j_ct}, #{j_cavity}, #{jdanwy}, #{jbigo}, #{w_b_gubn}, #{jchgoga0}, #{j_misayong} , #{j_sang}, #{jboxsu1})
mapper.select: select j1_key, j1_name from jcode1 where 1=1 and isnull(j1_key,'') Like concat('%',#{j1_key},'%') order by j1_key
select j2_key, j2_name from jcode2 where 1=1 and isnull(j2_key,'') Like concat('%',#{j2_key},'%') order by j2_key
SELECT TB_CA510.com_code as wcode, TB_CA510.com_rem1 as wcdnm FROM TB_CA510 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE TB_CA510.com_cls = '006' AND TB_CA510.com_code != '00'
